#!/bin/bash
# Redon Hub Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server/
fi
cd /mnt/server

apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python3 python3-pip python-dev-is-python3 libtool libmariadb-dev

if [[ ! -z ${VERSION} ]]; then
    echo -e "Using version ${VERSION}"
else
    echo -e "Please set the VERSION variable"
    exit 1
fi

GIT_ADDRESS=${GITREPO}

## pull git
if [ "$(ls -A /mnt/server)" ]; then
    echo -e "/mnt/server directory is not empty."
    if [ -d .git ]; then
        echo -e ".git directory exists"
        if [ -f .git/config ]; then
            echo -e "loading info from git config"
            ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)
        else
            echo -e "files found with no git config"
            echo -e "closing out without touching things to not break anything"
            exit 10
        fi
    fi

    if [ "${ORIGIN}" == "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
        echo "pulling latest from github"
        git pull
    fi
else
    echo -e "/mnt/server is empty.\ncloning files into repo"
    git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    git checkout tags/${VERSION}
fi

export HOME=/mnt/server


if [ -f /mnt/server/requirements.txt ]; then
    echo -e "Installing python requirements into folder"
    pip install -U --prefix .local -r /mnt/server/requirements.txt
fi

echo -e "${OPENCLOUD}"
if [ "${OPENCLOUD}" == "false" ] || [ "${OPENCLOUD}" == "0" ]; then
    echo -e "Open cloud disabled, generating mysql-schema"
    python -m prisma generate --schema /mnt/server/mysql-schema.prisma
fi

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0
